price: (27) Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? He [i.e., Allāh] constructed it.
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
